arm_group.description:
Fed vs. Fasted State
Diclofenac potassium 50 mg

brief_summary.textblock:
Investigate the supersaturation and precipitation behaviour of diclofenac in the stomach of
      healthy volunteers.

clinical_study.brief_title: Supersaturation and Precipitation of Diclofenac in the Stomach of Healthy Volunteers
clinical_study.condition: Supersaturation and Precipitation in the Stomach

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Healthy volunteers

          -  Age 20 - 35 years

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Illness

          -  Acute / Chronic gastric disorder

          -  Use of medicine

          -  (possible) pregnancy

          -  Frequent exposure to X-rays during the past year

          -  HIV / Hepatitis B Virus or Hepatitis C Virus infection

clinical_study.official_title: Supersaturation and Precipitation of Diclofenac in the Stomach of Healthy Volunteers

oversight_info.authority: Belgium: Federal Agency for Medicines and Health Products, FAMHP

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the Concentration - Time Curve

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Pharmacokinetics Study, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Basic Science
